elements.name: Test the functionality of the "Place Order" button

steps.name: open the website of DemoBlaze
user will see the carousel of the featured products
user clicks Login button
the Login form will appear
user fills in the username "vitrilukito" in the login form
user fills in the password "1234567" in the login form
user clicks the Login button
user will see "Welcome" and their username
user will click on the title of Samsung galaxy six
user will be directed to Samsung galaxy six details page
user will click on the Add to cart button
a pop-up message "Product added" will appear
user clicks Cart button
the cart list will be displayed
user will click the Place Order button
the place order form will be displayed

elements.name: Test the functionality of the "Close" button in the Place Order form

steps.name: open the website of DemoBlaze
user will see the carousel of the featured products
user clicks Login button
the Login form will appear
user fills in the username "vitrilukito" in the login form
user fills in the password "1234567" in the login form
user clicks the Login button
user will see "Welcome" and their username
user will click on the title of Samsung galaxy six
user will be directed to Samsung galaxy six details page
user will click on the Add to cart button
a pop-up message "Product added" will appear
user clicks Cart button
the cart list will be displayed
user will click the Place Order button
the place order form will be displayed
user will click the Close button in the Place Order form
user will be redirected to the Cart page

elements.name: Test the functionality of the "Delete" button in the Place Order form

steps.name: open the website of DemoBlaze
user will see the carousel of the featured products
user clicks Login button
the Login form will appear
user fills in the username "vitrilukito" in the login form
user fills in the password "1234567" in the login form
user clicks the Login button
user will see "Welcome" and their username
user will click on the title of Samsung galaxy six
user will be directed to Samsung galaxy six details page
user will click on the Add to cart button
a pop-up message "Product added" will appear
user clicks Cart button
the cart list will be displayed
user will click the Delete button in the Place Order form
the deleted item will be gone

elements.name: Test the functionality of the Place Order form normal

steps.name: open the website of DemoBlaze
user will see the carousel of the featured products
user clicks Login button
the Login form will appear
user fills in the username "vitrilukito" in the login form
user fills in the password "1234567" in the login form
user clicks the Login button
user will see "Welcome" and their username
user will click on the title of Samsung galaxy six
user will be directed to Samsung galaxy six details page
user will click on the Add to cart button
a pop-up message "Product added" will appear
user clicks Cart button
the cart list will be displayed
user will click the Place Order button
the place order form will be displayed
user will fill in the name "Vitri"
user will fill in the country "Indonesia"
user will fill in the city "Medan"
user will fill in the credit card "123456789010"
user will fill in the month "11"
user will fill in the year "2025"
user will click the Purchase button
the successful purchase confirmation details will be displayed

elements.name: Test the functionality of the contact form normal

steps.name: open the website of DemoBlaze
user will see the carousel of the featured products
user clicks Contact button
the contact form will appear
user will fill in the Contact Email "vitri@abc.com"
user will fill in the Contact Name "Vitri"
user will fill in the Message "Hi there!"
user will click the Send Message button
a pop-up message "Thanks for the message!!" will appear

elements.name: Test the functionality of the close button in the contact form

steps.name: open the website of DemoBlaze
user will see the carousel of the featured products
user clicks Contact button
the contact form will appear
user will click the Close button
user will be back to the Homepage
